Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

In yesterday's thread the topic of transparent content neg was brought up. (
http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5023#section-8.3.4)

How critical / useful is relying on transparent content neg? Can any one
give me some concrete use cases?

Regards
Glenn

--00c09f99e638becea60488119d9b
